dcterms:description: This dataset is constructed based on behavior logs of users who elected to use both search and recommendation services on the short-video app named Kuaishou over one month in 2022.
dcterms:title: Kuaishou Dataset

dcterms:description: The Amazon dataset is a widely used public dataset that includes user reviews and interactions, specifically focusing on the Kindle Store subset where all users and items have at least five reviews.
dcterms:title: Amazon Dataset
